title: Am I not able to use my PBE account with the league alpha client?
body: As above, can't log in. Thought they're both for testing purposes?>

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, they're two **completely separate systems**. Try logging into the alpha client with your regular account (if you've been granted access) and you should be good to go. If you haven't been granted access then I wish you luck with your application.

Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3RKbPLLZ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-03T05:00:54.190+0000)
>
> As *Lew* mentioned, they're two **completely separate systems**. Try logging into the alpha client with your regular account (if you've been granted access) and you should be good to go. If you haven't been granted access then I wish you luck with your application.
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions.

What he said^
They are two separate things and the alpha won't work for your pbe account.
